content: the snicklefritz pullover is now live 1 snicklefritz lite will be coming in spring 2025 - stay tuned feeling cheeky need to swatch for your snicklefritz sweater but want it to have a purpose the snicklefritz cowl is here to co-sponsor your childlike wonder and inspire you to play with color differently this cowl is available in 4 lengths and 2 yarn weights for optimum sandbox space - and hey if you re making another snicklefritz pattern next why not test out your color combo we re all for working smarter not harder here - let s work happier on top of it ***sizing *** 1 2 3 4 cowl circumference 20 24 28 32 inches / 50 60 70 80 cm cowl width 10 inches / 25 cm sample shown size 3 ***yarn requirements *** **dk weight version ** mc 345 416 484 554 yd / 316 380 443 507 m you may not use all of this depending on how many ccs you use ccs 23 23 23 25 yd/21 21 21 23 m per stripe or 276 276 276 300 yd/253 253 253 275 m total **fingering weight version ** mc 325 390 455 520 yd / 297 357 416 476 m you may not use all of this depending on how many ccs you use ccs 23 23 23 25 yd/21 21 21 23 m per stripe or 276 276 276 300 yd/253 253 253 275 m total ***suggested yarn *** dk weight version cascade 220 superwash 100% superwash merino in moonbeam mc and long dog yarn merino sock 85% superwash merino 15% recycled nylon princess bride collection mini skein set held double cc mc 2 2 3 3 skeins cc 1 mini skein per stripe 90yd/skein fingering weight version cascade 220 superwash fingering 100% superwash merino in blue indigo mc and the little foxes knits red fox sock 75% superwash merino 25% nylon encanto collection mini skein set cc mc 2 2 3 3 skeins cc 1 mini skein per stripe 90yd/skein ***needles & notions *** dk weight us 6 4 0mm * circular needle approx 20 long fingering weight us 3 3 25mm * circular needle approx 20 long **or size that achieves gauge* yarn snips or scissors crochet hook same or similar size as needles waste yarn 1 stitch marker tapestry needle for weaving in ends ***gauge *** dk version 21 st and 29 rounds = 4 in/10 cm stockinette st knit in the round fingering version 27 st and 37 rounds = 4 in/10 cm stockinette st knit in the round 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/snicklefritz-pullover
